queryParameters.name: TimeStamp

queryParameters.name: OrderBy
queryParameters.description: Specify a field to sort the records in the response. When this isn’t set, the records will be ordered by the primary ID (e.g. itemID).

queryParameters.name: OrderBy_Desc
queryParameters.description: Used to sort results according to the orderby parameter in reverse order. Must be used with the orderby parameter
